title: ‘Right of Way’ for 17-KM gas pipeline still awaited from Sindh govt: Omar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP):Minister for Energy Omar Ayub Khan on Monday said the Sui Southern Gas Company (SSGC) was still waiting to get the ‘Right of Way’ from the Sindh government for laying a 17-Kilometer gas pipeline in Karachi.
The minister, in a tweet, said the Sindh government did not permit to lay the pipeline despite ‘repeated’ letters and meetings during the last one-and-a-half years.
“The Sindh government will be directly responsible for any gas shortages in Karachi,” Omar Ayub said.
